item.title: What I'm doing this summer
item.description: Work I’m doing Collaborating with Sandia National Labs on Bayesian model calibration and uncertainty quantification under model misspecification Original research on post-selection inference, for application to sparse normal means problem and spatial hotspot detection Conferences I am attending ACIC Atlantic Causal Inference Conference May 21 - 23, 2018 Carnegie Melon University Pittsburgh, PA ISBA ISBA World Meeting 2018 June 24 - 29, 2018 University of Edinburgh United Kingdom
